name: stround
description: Rounding methods for exact numbers using strings.

scripts.test-dist: env TEST_MODE=dist mocha --compilers js:babel/register --recursive --reporter spec --timeout 500 test
scripts.test-dist-min: env TEST_MODE=dist-min mocha --compilers js:babel/register --recursive --reporter spec --timeout 500 test
scripts.test-all: npm test && npm run test-dist && npm run test-dist-min

author: Square, Inc.
